title: in the Schedule are delegated to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (delegation ministerial functions) order 2024

title: in the Schedule are delegated to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Health conferred on him by or under the enactments specified 
in the Schedule are delegated to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department 
of Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [209] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister health conferred enactment specified schedule delegated mary butler minister state department health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 10th may 2024 209 3

title: in the Schedule are delegated to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department
heading: Mental Health Acts 2001 to 2022
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Mental Health Acts 2001 to 2022 

Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2006 (No. 11 of 2006) 

Sections 32 and 35 of the Nursing Homes Support Scheme Act 2009 (No. 15 of 
2009) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

7 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [209]
text_norm: schedule mental health act 2001 2022 criminal law (insanity) act 2006 (no 11 2006) section 32 35 nursing home support scheme act 2009 (no 15 2009) given official seal government 7 may 2024 simon harris taoiseach 4 209

title: in the Schedule are delegated to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2024 delegates to Mary 
Butler, Minister of State at the Department of Health the statutory powers and 
duties of the Minister for Health mentioned in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [209] 5
